Overview

In this hands-on exercise, I learned how to import cool data and wrangle them using the proper R packages.

Getting started

First import:

```{r}
pacman::p_load(sf,tidyverse)
```

Second import:

```{r}
mpsz <- st_read(dsn = "data/geospatial", layer = "MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL")
```
